name: Subway Princess Runner
description:
Subway Princess Runner is an endless princess running game, Rush as fast as you can dodge the oncoming trains, Save your loved beautiful princess, run in the snow subway. More characters, such as Bruce Lee, Santa Claus, choose your best liked runner, what are you waiting for?

[Subway Princess Runner Features]:
-Snow subway theme game
-Influent screen touch
-Double tap for skateboard, feeling the special running
-Challenge the highest score with world players
-Grind trains with your cool crew
-Colorful and vivid HD graphics
-Upgrade all the properties to get endless power

[HOW TO PLAY Subway Princess Runner]:
-Jump, slide to avoid obstacle
-Smooth touch your phone
-Easy to run left or right
-Use prop of scores, coins
-Choose your liked characters

Protect your beautiful princess, join the best runner game!
